TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ServicePointManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理 物件的集合。

span.span: Manages the collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用來建立、 維護及刪除的執行個體的靜態類別類別。 is a static class used to create, maintain, and delete instances of the class. 當應用程式要求對網際網路資源統一資源識別元 (URI) 連接透過物件傳回包含在主機與識別配置的連接資訊的物件URI。When an application requests a connection to an Internet resource Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) through the object, the returns a object that contains connection information for the host and scheme identified by the URI. 如果沒有現有物件，該主機和配置，物件會傳回現有物件; 否則物件建立新物件。If there is an existing object for that host and scheme, the object returns the existing object; otherwise, the object creates a new object. .NET Framework 4.6 包含新的安全性功能會封鎖不安全的加密與雜湊演算法的連線。The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections. 例如，使用 TLS/SSL 透過 Api 的應用程式， ， ， ，等等，目標為.NET Framework 4.6 預設以取得更安全的行為。Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as , , , , , etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default. 開發人員可能想要取消這個行為，以維護 RC4 服務以使用其現有 SSL3 服務或 TLS 的互通性。Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services or TLS w/ RC4 services. [這篇文章](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494)說明如何修改您的程式碼，讓新的行為會停用。[This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立連接至 URI www.contoso.com 的物件。The following code example creates a object for connections to the URI www.contoso.com. [!code-cpp[Classic ServicePoint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePoint Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServicePoint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePoint Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServicePoint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePoint Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.ICertificatePolicy CertificatePolicy { get; set; }
.property class System.Net.ICertificatePolicy CertificatePolicy
Public Shared Property CertificatePolicy As ICertificatePolicy
public: static property System::Net::ICertificatePolicy ^ CertificatePolicy { System::Net::ICertificatePolicy ^ get(); void set(System::Net::ICertificatePolicy ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定伺服器憑證原則。

span.span: Gets or sets policy for server certificates.

value.span: 實作 介面的物件。

span.span: An object that implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為介面物件物件會使用該執行個體，而不是預設的憑證原則中定義的憑證原則。When the property is set to an interface object, the object uses the certificate policy defined in that instance instead of the default certificate policy. 預設的憑證原則允許有效的憑證和有效的憑證已過期。The default certificate policy allows valid certificates and valid certificates that have expired. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何攔截憑證原則例外狀況的自訂憑證原則。The following code example shows how to catch a certificate policy exception for a custom certificate policy. 它會假設已定義憑證原則物件時，Web 資源的統一資源識別元 (URI) 會包含在變數中`myUri`，而且沒有方法，名為`ProcessResponse`，以執行應用程式的工作。It assumes that the certificate policy object has been defined, that the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for the Web resource is contained in the variable `myUri`, and that there is a method named `ProcessResponse` that performs the work of the application. [!code-cpp[Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: To set the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，指出是否根據憑證授權撤銷清單檢查憑證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the certificate is checked against the certificate authority revocation list.

value.span: 如果檢查憑證撤銷清單，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the certificate revocation list is checked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是`true`，根據憑證授權撤銷清單中，檢查憑證的憑證驗證程序的一部分。When the is `true`, the certificate is checked against the certificate authority revocation list, as part of the certificate validation process. 預設值是`false`。Its default value is `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定這個屬性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#10)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件所允許的同時連線最大數。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent connections allowed by a object.

value.span: 物件所允許的同時連線最大數。

span.span: The maximum number of concurrent connections allowed by a object.

value.span: 預設值為 2。

span.span: The default value is 2.

value.span: 如果將 autoConfig property 設定為 ，當應用程式以 ASP.NET 主機執行時，就無法透過設定檔修改此屬性的值。

span.span: When an app is running as an ASP.NET host, it is not possible to alter the value of this property through the config file if the autoConfig property is set to .

value.span: 不過，當 autoConfig 屬性是 時，您可以透過程式設計方式來變更該值。

span.span: However, you can change the value programmatically when the autoConfig property is .

value.span: 當 AppDomain 載入時，設定一次慣用值。

span.span: Set your preferred value once, when the AppDomain loads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會設定預設的並行連線數目上限，物件指派給屬性建立時物件。The property sets the default maximum number of concurrent connections that the object assigns to the property when creating objects. 變更屬性具有不會影響現有物件; 它只會影響初始化之後變更的物件。Changing the property has no effect on existing objects; it affects only objects that are initialized after the change. 如果直接或透過組態尚未設定此屬性的值，則值預設為常數。If the value of this property has not been set either directly or through configuration, the value defaults to the constant . > [!NOTE] > 任何變更屬性會影響 HTTP 1.0 和 HTTP 1.1 的連線。Any changes to the property affect both HTTP 1.0 and HTTP 1.1 connections. 不是個別修改連接限制 HTTP 1.0 和 HTTP 1.1 通訊協定。It is not possible to separately alter the connection limit for HTTP 1.0 and HTTP 1.1 protocols. 當用於伺服器環境 (ASP.NET)預設為更高版本的連接數目，也就是 10。When used in the server environment (ASP.NET) defaults to higher number of connections, which is 10. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定這個屬性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#10)]

span.span: is less than or equal to 0.

permission.span: 不受限制的 Web 權限。

span.span: for unrestricted Web permissions.

span.span: The default number of persistent connections (2) allowed on a object connected to an HTTP/1.1 or later server.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數，如果尚未直接或透過組態設定 屬性的值，則會使用此欄位初始化 屬性。

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出有效的網域名稱服務 (DNS) 解析時間長度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how long a Domain Name Service (DNS) resolution is considered valid.

value.span: 逾時值 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: The time-out value, in milliseconds.

value.span: -1 值表示無限逾時期間。

span.span: A value of -1 indicates an infinite time-out period.

value.span: 預設值為 120,000 毫秒 (兩分鐘)。

span.span: The default value is 120,000 milliseconds (two minutes).

.property bool EnableDnsRoundRobin
Public Shared Property EnableDnsRoundRobin As Boolean
public: static property bool EnableDnsRoundRobin { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出網域名稱服務 (DNS) 解析是否會在適用的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址間循環。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a Domain Name Service (DNS) resolution rotates among the applicable Internet Protocol (IP) addresses.

value.span: 如果 DNS 解析永遠傳回特定主機的第一個 IP 位址，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if a DNS resolution always returns the first IP address for a particular host; otherwise .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多個 IP 位址與主機名稱相關聯時，DNS 解析通常會傳回第一個 IP 位址。When more than one IP address is associated with a host name, a DNS resolution normally returns only the first IP address. 如果您將此屬性設定為`true`，則後續的 DNS 解決方案會循環顯示所有可用的 IP 位址之特定主控件。If you set this property to `true`, then subsequent DNS resolutions will cycle through all available IP addresses for a particular host. 此選項時，服務會使用 DNS 與負載平衡伺服器或伺服器叢集之間的機制。This option is useful when a service uses DNS as a load balancing mechanism between servers or server clusters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定這個屬性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey/cpp/servicepoint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey/CS/servicepoint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey/VB/servicepoint.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得這個 執行個體的 。

span.span: Gets the for this instance.

value.span: 要用於這個 執行個體的加密原則。

span.span: The encryption policy to use for this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果組態檔中未指定值屬性預設為。If a value is not specified in the configuration file, the property defaults to . 這套用至 SSL/TLS 工作階段上執行個體。This is applied to an SSL/TLS session on this instance. 使用 Null 編碼器時，需要加密原則設為。The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Expect100Continue { get; set; }
.property bool Expect100Continue
Public Shared Property Expect100Continue As Boolean
public: static property bool Expect100Continue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，用以判斷是否有使用 100-Continue 行為。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether 100-Continue behavior is used.

value.span: 表示啟用 100-Continue 行為。

span.span: to enable 100-Continue behavior.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`true`、 100-繼續使用行為。When this property is set to `true`, 100-Continue behavior is used. 用戶端會要求使用`PUT`和`POST`方法會將 Expect 標頭加入要求如果屬性是`true`和屬性大於零或屬性為 true。Client requests that use the `PUT` and `POST` methods will add an Expect header to the request if the property is `true` and property is greater than zero or the property is true. 用戶端會預期收到 100-繼續回應的伺服器，表示用戶端應該傳送的回傳資料。The client will expect to receive a 100-Continue response from the server to indicate that the client should send the data to be posted. 此機制可讓用戶端，以避免透過網路傳送大量資料時的伺服器會根據要求的標頭，想要拒絕的要求。This mechanism allows clients to avoid sending large amounts of data over the network when the server, based on the request headers, intends to reject the request. 例如，假設屬性是`false`。For example, assume the property is `false`. 當要求傳送到伺服器時，它包含的資料。When the request is sent to the server, it includes the data. 如果在讀取之後的要求標頭，伺服器需要驗證，且必須傳送 401 回應，用戶端必須重新傳送適當驗證標頭的資料。If, after reading the request headers, the server requires authentication and must send a 401 response, the client must resend the data with proper authentication headers. 如果這個屬性是`true`，要求標頭傳送到伺服器。If this property is `true`, the request headers are sent to the server. 如果伺服器已拒絕該要求，它會傳送 100-繼續回應信號資料可以傳輸。If the server has not rejected the request, it sends a 100-Continue response signaling that the data can be transmitted. 如果，就如同上述範例中，伺服器需要驗證，它會傳送 401 回應和用戶端已經傳送的資料。If, as in the preceding example, the server requires authentication, it sends the 401 response and the client has not unnecessarily transmitted the data. 變更這個屬性的值不會影響現有物件。Changing the value of this property does not affect existing objects. 只新增受影響的變更之後所建立的物件。Only new objects created after the change are affected. 100-繼續行為不會用於 HTTP 1.0 要求即使這個屬性設定為`true`。The 100-Continue behavior is not used for HTTP 1.0 requests even if this property is set to `true`. 預期 100-繼續行為完全 IETF RFC 2616 一節所述 10.1.1。The Expect 100-Continue behavior is fully described in IETF RFC 2616 Section 10.1.1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定這個屬性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#10)]

Public Shared Property MaxServicePointIdleTime As Integer
public: static property int MaxServicePointIdleTime { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的最大閒置時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum idle time of a object.

value.span: 物件的最大閒置時間，以毫秒為單位。

span.span: The maximum idle time, in milliseconds, of a object.
The default value is 100,000 milliseconds (100 seconds).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會設定最大閒置時間的物件指派給屬性建立時物件。The property sets the maximum idle time that the object assigns to the property when creating objects. 變更此值只會影響值變更之後，會初始化的物件。Changes to this value affect only objects that are initialized after the value is changed. 之後物件已閒置中指定的時間，則適合進行記憶體回收。After a object has been idle for the time specified in , it is eligible for garbage collection. A物件處於閒置狀態時與相關聯的連接清單物件是空的。A object is idle when the list of connections associated with the object is empty. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定這個屬性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#8)]

span.span: is less than or greater than .

permission.span: 不受限制的 Web 權限。

span.span: For unrestricted Web permissions.
Associated enumeration:

summary.span: 取得或設定要在任何時間維護 物件的最大數。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of objects to maintain at any time.

value.span: 要維護的 物件最大數。

span.span: The maximum number of objects to maintain.

value.span: 預設值為 0，這表示 物件數沒有限制。

span.span: The default value is 0, which means there is no limit to the number of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您減少屬性下方的數字中是否存在，目前的物件刪除物件的最長閒置的時間。When you reduce the property below the number of objects currently in existence, the deletes the objects with the longest idle times. 如果數目具有使用中連接物件的值大於、物件刪除它們變成閒置狀態的物件。If the number of objects with active connections is greater than the value of , the object deletes the objects as they become idle. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定這個屬性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#8)]

summary.span: 將這個屬性值設定為 將會讓來自 HttpWebRequest 的所有連出 TCP 連線使用通訊端上的原生通訊端選項 SO_REUSE_UNICASTPORT。

span.span: Setting this property value to causes all outbound TCP connections from HttpWebRequest to use the native socket option SO_REUSE_UNICASTPORT on the socket.

summary.span: 這會導致共用底層連出連接埠。

span.span: This causes the underlying outgoing ports to be shared.

summary.span: 對於短時間內有大量連出連線的案例，這非常實用，但應用程式可能會遇到連接埠耗盡的問題。

span.span: This is useful for scenarios where a large number of outgoing connections are made in a short time, and the app risks running out of ports.

value.span: 傳回 。

span.span: Returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.SecurityProtocolType SecurityProtocol { get; set; }
.property valuetype System.Net.SecurityProtocolType SecurityProtocol
Public Shared Property SecurityProtocol As SecurityProtocolType
public: static property System::Net::SecurityProtocolType SecurityProtocol { System::Net::SecurityProtocolType get(); void set(System::Net::SecurityProtocolType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定由 物件管理的 物件所使用的安全性通訊協定。

span.span: Gets or sets the security protocol used by the objects managed by the object.

value.span: 列舉型別中定義的一個值。

span.span: One of the values defined in the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會選取要用於新連線的安全通訊端層 (SSL) 或傳輸層安全性 (TLS) 通訊協定的版本不變更現有的連線。This property selects the version of the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol to use for new connections; existing connections aren't changed. 從.NET Framework 4.7 開始，這個屬性的預設值是。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.7, the default value of this property is . 這可讓網路為基礎的應用程式開發介面的.NET Framework （例如 FTP、 HTTP 和 SMTP） 繼承的預設安全性通訊協定，從作業系統或系統管理員執行任何自訂設定。This allows .NET Framework networking APIs based on (such as FTP, HTTP, and SMTP) to inherit the default security protocols from the operating system or from any custom configurations performed by a system administrator. 關於 SSL/TLS 通訊協定預設會啟用在每個版本的 Windows 作業系統的資訊，請參閱[中 TLS/SSL (安全通道 SSP) 的通訊協定](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/mt808159.aspx)。For information about which SSL/TLS protocols are enabled by default on each version of the Windows operating system, see [Protocols in TLS/SSL (Schannel SSP)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/mt808159.aspx). 如需透過.NET Framework 4.6.2 的.NET framework 版本，沒有預設值會列出這個屬性。For versions of the .NET Framework through the .NET Framework 4.6.2, no default value is listed for this property. 安全性橫向一直在改變，變更預設通訊協定和保護層級會隨時間改變以避免已知弱點的攻擊。The security landscape changes constantly, and default protocols and protection levels are changed over time in order to avoid known weaknesses. 預設值是依個別電腦設定、 已安裝的軟體和套用修補程式而有所不同。Defaults vary depending on individual machine configuration, installed software, and applied patches. 使用特定的保護層級，或假設預設會使用指定的安全性層級上，您的程式碼應該永遠不會以隱含方式而定。Your code should never implicitly depend on using a particular protection level, or on the assumption that a given security level is used by default. 如果您的應用程式相依於特定的安全性層級使用，您必須明確指定的層級，然後檢查以確定它實際上是在已建立的連接上使用。If your app depends on the use of a particular security level, you must explicitly specify that level and then check to be sure that it is actually in use on the established connection. 此外，您的程式碼應該設計成可承受支援通訊協定的變更，因此通常變更小事先通知與以降低新興的威脅。Further, your code should be designed to be robust in the face of changes to which protocols are supported, as such changes are often made with little advance notice in order to mitigate emerging threats. .NET Framework 4.6 包含新的安全性功能會封鎖不安全的加密與雜湊演算法的連線。The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections. 使用 TLS/SSL 透過例如 HttpClient、 HttpWebRequest、 FTPClient、 SmtpClient、 SslStream 」 等的 Api，並以.NET Framework 4.6 為目標的應用程式預設會取得更安全的行為。Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as HttpClient, HttpWebRequest, FTPClient, SmtpClient, SslStream, etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default. 開發人員可能想要取消這個行為，以維護與 RC4 服務以其現有 SSL3 服務或 TLS 的互通性。Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services OR TLS w/ RC4 services. [這篇文章](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494)說明如何修改您的程式碼，讓新的行為會停用。[This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled.

exception.span: 指定用來設定屬性的值不是一個有效的 列舉值。

span.span: The value specified to set the property is not a valid enumeration value.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback ServerCertificateValidationCallback { get; set; }
.property class System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback ServerCertificateValidationCallback
Public Shared Property ServerCertificateValidationCallback As RemoteCertificateValidationCallback

public: static property System::Net::Security::RemoteCertificateValidationCallback ^ ServerCertificateValidationCallback { System::Net::Security::RemoteCertificateValidationCallback ^ get(); void set(System::Net::Security::RemoteCertificateValidationCallback ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來驗證伺服器憑證的回呼。

span.span: Gets or sets the callback to validate a server certificate.
A .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以設定用於用戶端的伺服器憑證的自訂驗證方法的屬性。An application can set the property to a method to use for custom validation by the client of the server certificate. 執行自訂驗證時`sender`參數傳遞至可以是主機名稱的字串或物件衍生自(，例如) 取決於屬性。When doing custom validation, the `sender` parameter passed to the can be a host string name or an object derived from (, for example) depending on the property. 不使用自訂驗證時，憑證名稱是用來建立要求的主機名稱比較。When custom validation is not used, the certificate name is compared with the host name used to create the request. 例如，如果已傳遞的參數"https://www.contoso.com/default.html"，預設行為是讓用戶端檢查的憑證對 www.contoso.com。For example, if was passed a parameter of "https://www.contoso.com/default.html", the default behavior is for the client to check the certificate against www.contoso.com. 雖然多點傳送的委派，只能從上次執行的事件處理常式傳回的值都會被視為優先。Despite being a multicast delegate, only the value returned from the last-executed event handler is considered authoritative. 換句話說，您可以將多個委派，附加和所有他們取得從回呼。In other words, you can attach multiple delegates, and they all get a callback from . 每個回呼的傳回值，這個值，指出憑證是否已接受或不過，遵守從最後一個委派的值。Each callback returns a value that indicates whether the certificate is accepted or not; however, only the value from the last delegate is respected.

span.span: to set the property.
Associated enumeration: .

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This API is no longer supported.", true)

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetTcpKeepAlive (bool enabled, int keepAliveTime, int keepAliveInterval);
.method public static hidebysig void SetTcpKeepAlive(bool enabled, int32 keepAliveTime, int32 keepAliveInterval) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetTcpKeepAlive (enabled As Boolean, keepAliveTime As Integer, keepAliveInterval As Integer)
public: static void SetTcpKeepAlive(bool enabled, int keepAliveTime, int keepAliveInterval);

param.name: enabled
param.span: 如果設定為 True，表示會使用指定的 keepAliveTime 和 keepAliveInterval 值啟用 TCP 連線的 TCP 保持連線選項。

span.span: If set to true, then the TCP keep-alive option on a TCP connection will be enabled using the specified keepAliveTime and keepAliveInterval values.

param.span: 如果設定為 False，則表示會停用 TCP 保持連線選項，並忽略其餘的參數。

span.span: If set to false, then the TCP keep-alive option is disabled and the remaining parameters are ignored.
The default value is false.

param.name: keepAliveTime
param.span: 指定第一個 Keep-Alive 封包傳送之前的無活動逾時 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: Specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent.
The value must be greater than 0.

param.span: 如果傳遞的值小於或等於零，則擲回 。

span.span: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an is thrown.

param.name: keepAliveInterval
param.span: 指定若未接收認可，後續 Keep-Alive 封包傳送的間隔 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: Specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received.
The value must be greater than 0.

param.span: 如果傳遞的值小於或等於零，則擲回 。

span.span: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an is thrown.

summary.span: 啟用或停用 TCP 連線的 Keep-Alive 選項。

span.span: Enables or disables the keep-alive option on a TCP connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以要求 TCP/IP 提供者使用的 TCP 連線的 keep-alive 封包。An application can request that a TCP/IP provider enable the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection. 預設為使用 TCP 連線的 keep-alive 封包會停用。The default is that the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection is disabled. TCP 通訊端時的預設設定初始化 2 小時的設定保持逾時和保持連接間隔為 1 秒。The default settings when a TCP socket is initialized sets the keep-alive timeout to 2 hours and the keep-alive interval to 1 second. `keepAliveTime`參數指定以毫秒為單位，與第一個 keep-alive 封包傳送之前的無活動逾時。The `keepAliveTime` parameter specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent. `keepAliveInterval`參數指定的間隔，以毫秒為單位，介於時如果未收到收條，後續 keep-alive 封包會傳送。The `keepAliveInterval` parameter specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received. 保持運作的探查數目不能變更，並設為 10。The number of keep-alive probes cannot be changed and is set to 10. 如果 TCP 連線中斷時持續作用，因為的會傳回到任何呼叫正在進行中通訊端，而且任何後續呼叫都會失敗並的。If a TCP connection is dropped as the result of keep-alives, a of is returned to any calls in progress on the socket, and any subsequent calls will fail with a of .

exception.span: 或 參數的指定值會小於或等於 0。

span.span: The value specified for or parameter is less than or equal to 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool UseNagleAlgorithm { get; set; }
.property bool UseNagleAlgorithm
Public Shared Property UseNagleAlgorithm As Boolean
public: static property bool UseNagleAlgorithm { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 判斷由這個 物件所管理的服務點是否使用 Nagle 演算法。

span.span: Determines whether the Nagle algorithm is used by the service points managed by this object.

value.span: 表示使用 Nagle 演算法；否則為 。

span.span: to use the Nagle algorithm; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Nagle 演算法用來減少網路流量，緩衝處理小型資料封包，並將它們以單一封包傳輸。The Nagle algorithm is used to reduce network traffic by buffering small packets of data and transmitting them as a single packet. 此程序也稱為 「 nagling";它廣泛使用，因為它可以減少傳送的封包數目，並降低每個封包的額外負荷。This process is also referred to as "nagling"; it is widely used because it reduces the number of packets transmitted and lowers the overhead per packet. 變更這個屬性的值不會影響現有物件。Changing the value of this property does not affect existing objects. 只有新服務點建立之後變更會受到影響。Only new service points created after the change are affected. IETF RFC 896 的完整說明 Nagle 演算法。The Nagle algorithm is fully described in IETF RFC 896. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定這個屬性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#10)]
